```{r}

# Assuming the data is already read into an R dataframe named 'data'

# Selecting unique EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE and EDUCATION_LEVEL
education_levels <- data %>%
  select(EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE, EDUCATION_LEVEL) %>%
```
